IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_guild_member_infos') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_member_infos GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_member_infos @guild_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT g.character_id, c.nickname, c.class, g.position, g.rank_id, g.contributiveness, reset_withdraw_at, day_withdraw FROM dbo.Guild_Members AS g INNER JOIN dbo.Characters AS c ON g.character_id = c.id WHERE guild_id = @guild_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
